text:
Jet | UX/UI DESIGNER | ON-SITE | NYC (Hoboken, NJ) | Contract | http://www.jet.com

UX/UI designer - Customer experience team:

1-2 years experience with e-commerce website or mobile applications. Must be familiar with Sketch, Principle, Zeplin, Adobe suite.

Great team and atmosphere, you can learn more about the culture here: http://www.jet.com/careers

Send portfolio and resume to Nicholas.braver@jet.com
